law_text: for vehicles and vehicle combinations with a total weight or total towing weight of not more than 3500 kg, exceeding by more than 100 kg but not more than 5 percent.
notes: Overweight: >100 kg, but <= 5% over maximum gross weight (<= 3500 kg). Fine applies to item 1.b.

law_text: for vehicles and vehicle combinations with a total weight or total towing weight of more than 3500 kg, by more than 100 kg up to 5 percent, but not more than 1000 kg.
notes: Overweight: >100 kg and <= 1000 kg, but <= 5% over maximum gross weight (> 3500 kg). Fine applies to item 1.c.

article_ref: Art. 9 Abs. 2 und 30 Abs. 2 SVG, Art. 67 Abs. 2 und 3 VRV
notes: Exceeding permitted axle load (after deduction of measuring tolerance), up to 100 kg. Fine applies to item 2.a.

article_ref: Art. 9 Abs. 2 und 30 Abs. 2 SVG, Art. 67 Abs. 2 und 3 VRV
law_text: for vehicles with a total weight of more than 3500 kg, exceeding by more than 100 kg, but not more than 2 percent.
notes: Exceeding permitted axle load (>100 kg, but <= 2% over limit) for vehicles > 3500 kg. Fine applies to item 2.b.

article_ref: Art. 9 Abs. 2 und 30 Abs. 2 SVG, Art. 67 Abs. 2 und 3 VRV
law_text: by more than 2 percent, but not more than 5 percent
notes: Exceeding permitted total weight/combination weight (after deduction of measuring tolerance) by >2% but <=5%. Fine applies to item 3.a.

article_ref: Art. 9 Abs. 2 und 30 Abs. 2 SVG, Art. 67 Abs. 2 und 3 VRV
notes: Exceeding permitted total weight/combination weight (after deduction of measuring tolerance) by >5%. Fine applies to item 3.b.

law_text: Riding a motorcycle on a sidewalk
notes: Riding a motorcycle on a sidewalk.

law_text: Failure to keep one's place by a motorcycle rider within the column when traffic is stopped.
notes: Motorcycle rider not keeping their place within the column when traffic is halted (e.g., lane filtering/splitting when stopped).

article_ref: Art. 27 Abs. 1 SVG; Art. 4a Abs. 1 und 5 VRV; Art. 22 Abs. 1, 22a, 22b Abs. 2 und 22c Abs. 1 SSV
notes: Speeding inside built-up areas, 1-5 km/h over the limit (after deduction of measuring tolerance). Fine applies to item 303.1.a.

article_ref: Art. 27 Abs. 1 SVG; Art. 4a Abs. 1 und 5 VRV; Art. 22 Abs. 1, 22a, 22b Abs. 2 und 22c Abs. 1 SSV
notes: Speeding inside built-up areas, 6-10 km/h over the limit (after deduction of measuring tolerance). Fine applies to item 303.1.b.

article_ref: Art. 27 Abs. 1 SVG; Art. 4a Abs. 1 und 5 VRV; Art. 22 Abs. 1, 22a, 22b Abs. 2 und 22c Abs. 1 SSV
notes: Speeding inside built-up areas, 11-15 km/h over the limit (after deduction of measuring tolerance). Fine applies to item 303.1.c.

article_ref: Art. 27 Abs. 1 SVG; Art. 4a Abs. 1 und 5 VRV; Art. 22 Abs. 1 SSV
notes: Speeding outside built-up areas or on motorways/semi-motorways, 1-5 km/h over the limit (after deduction of measuring tolerance). Fine applies to item 303.2.a.

article_ref: Art. 27 Abs. 1 SVG; Art. 4a Abs. 1 und 5 VRV; Art. 22 Abs. 1 SSV
notes: Speeding outside built-up areas or on motorways/semi-motorways, 6-10 km/h over the limit (after deduction of measuring tolerance). Fine applies to item 303.2.b.

article_ref: Art. 27 Abs. 1 SVG; Art. 4a Abs. 1 und 5 VRV; Art. 22 Abs. 1 SSV
notes: Speeding outside built-up areas or on motorways/semi-motorways, 11-15 km/h over the limit (after deduction of measuring tolerance). Fine applies to item 303.2.c.

article_ref: Art. 27 Abs. 1 SVG; Art. 4a Abs. 1 und 5 VRV; Art. 22 Abs. 1 SSV
notes: Speeding outside built-up areas or on motorways/semi-motorways, 16-20 km/h over the limit (after deduction of measuring tolerance). Fine applies to item 303.2.d.
